Package frc.robot.controls

Class LogitechPro

java.lang.Object
edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.GenericHID
edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.Joystick
frc.robot.controls.FlightStick
frc.robot.controls.LogitechPro
public class LogitechPro extends FlightStick
A FlightStick specifically calibrated for the Logitech Extreme 3D Pro joystick.
